contents.text: Welcome to Bedrock Analytics in the East Bay, where we turn CPG manufacturers’ data into powerful stories for leading retailers.
For new project inquiries or partnership opportunities, press 1.
To start a new analytics project, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with an analytics consultant.

navigationGoals: Discuss launching a new analytics project with a consultant
I’m an ex-military veteran running a CPG brand and want to start a new analytics project.
I want to initiate a proof-of-concept predictive modeling project for SKU-level demand forecasting.
I’d like to start a new analytics project and speak with a consultant.
I’m seeking to commission a new analytics project that applies statistical modeling to consumer purchase data for my physics research thesis.

contents.text: If you are an existing client, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to your client success manager.

navigationGoals: Connect with my client success manager about an existing analytics engagement
I’m an ex-military veteran and existing client; I need to check the status of our ongoing analytics engagement.
I'm an existing client and need to review the timeline and deliverables for our current analytics engagement.
I’m an existing client and need to talk to my client success manager about my project.
As an existing client, I’d like to review the status of our ongoing analytics study using network analysis on supply-chain data.

contents.text: For technical support or billing questions, press 2.
For data integration and platform support, press 1.
Please stay on the line while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a data integration issue on the analytics platform
As a veteran client, I need technical help integrating my sales data into your platform.
I need help troubleshooting OAuth authentication failures in our data ingestion pipeline.
I need help integrating our data into your analytics platform.
I need technical support integrating our experimental sales simulator dataset with your analytics platform; the API authentication fails.

contents.text: For billing or general inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a charge on my latest billing invoice
I’m an ex-military veteran with a billing question about my last invoice.
I have questions about unexpected overage charges on our latest analytics subscription invoice.
I have a question about my invoice and need to connect with billing.
I have questions about the latest invoice for our analytics services related to my research and need clarity on the charges.
